downloadTitle: Office Communicator Web Access: Microsoft Office Communicator Web Access Getting Started Guide
downloadDescription: This guide describes how to use the instant messaging (IM) and presence features of Microsoft® Office Communicator Web Access.
detailsSection:
This guide describes how to use the instant messaging (IM) and presence features of Communicator Web Access.

This guide contains the following sections:

  • Getting connected to Communicator Web Access.

  • Managing your contacts.

  • Setting your presence information to indicate whether you are available for instant messaging.

  • Checking another user's presence information.

  • Sending an instant message.

  • Setting options to customize Communicator Web Access features.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Office applications:


    • Microsoft Office Word 2003

    • Microsoft Word 2002
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Download the file by clicking the Download button (above) and saving the file to your hard disk.
  2. Double-click the CommunicatorWebAccess_GettingStarted.doc to open the document.
To remove this download:

To remove the download file, delete the file CommunicatorWebAccess_GettingStarted.doc.
